text: @KamalaHarris This is not the 1st time this great nation has had to celebrate their holidays, B-Day's without their loved ones. We r an understanding nation, a strong nation, united nation. But it is the 1st time our POTUS abandoned us for his personal gain. https://t.co/uOJIaCM0kO
